refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis

refsect1.title: Properties
refsect1.synopsis: "dhcp-client-id" gchararray : Read / Write "dhcp-hostname" gchararray : Read / Write "ignore-auto-dns" gboolean : Read / Write / Construct "ignore-auto-routes" gboolean : Read / Write / Construct "method" gchararray : Read / Write "never-default" gboolean : Read / Write / Construct

refsect2.title: The "never-default" property
refsect2.para: Never make this connection the default IPv4 connection.
